alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 11:26AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT EASTERN FREMONT...WESTERN NATRONA AND FAR SOUTHWESTERN JOHNSON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. At 1125 AM MST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 9 miles south of Hamilton Dome to 10 miles southeast of Oregon Buttes and moving east at 35 MPH. A second squall line was along US Highway 20/26 between Shoshoni and Natrona, moving northeast at 25 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Riverton, Lander, Shoshoni, Pavillion, Jeffrey City, Arapahoe, Hudson, Kinnear, Alcova, Red Canyon, Powder River, Lysite, Moneta, Hiland, Waltman, Ervay, Lost Cabin, Green Mountain, Goldeneye Reservoir and Devil`s Gate. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
